author: andreasmyth
msg: Fixed issue with HTTPTransportServerTest - transport needs to be deactivated at the end of the test to free resources in the (port map of the) HTTPServerEngine.
Have log4j console appender write to stderr instead stdout (as the ConsoleHandler in the java.util.logging package does).

author: andreasmyth
msg: Removed some debug stuff from HTTTransportTest that should not have been merged.

author: andreasmyth
msg: Removed log4j warnings by supplying log4j properties files (as with logging properties, used one version for unit and system tests and one for runtime).
Re-installed behaviour of handling the http request on a thread supplied by the endpoint's executor (if one was associated with the endpoint).

The test for the latter is still disabled: although it passes when run as the single test in test case HTTPTransportTest there are issues when  both tests in this test case are run. The same problem exists if the first test (not using the executor) is run twice.

author: ulhasbhole
msg: * Updated NOTICE and NOTICE.source file for ActiveMQ dependency.

author: andreasmyth
msg: Fix for eclipse classpath issues with ActiveMQ.
